sentences.en: Everyone admired her elegance and her beauty.
sentences.cn: 人人都羡慕她的优雅和美丽。

sentences.en: His writings were marked by an extraordinary lucidity and elegance of style.
sentences.cn: 他的作品简洁明晰，文风典雅。

sentences.en: In the dining-room the draperies create an atmosphere of elegance.
sentences.cn: 在餐厅里，打褶装饰物能营造雅致的氛围。

sentences.en: She managed to impart great elegance to the unpretentious dress she was wearing.
sentences.cn: 她使自己朴素的衣着看起来也十分优雅。

sentences.en: She was the personification of elegance.
The dress reflects our signature style of understated elegance with a strong feeling of individuality.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子体现了我们所追求的低调优雅又有强烈个性感的独特风格。

sentences.en: The furnishings in the room imparted an air of elegance.
sentences.cn: 这个房间的家具带给这房间一种优雅的气氛.

sentences.en: The furniture managed to combine practicality with elegance.
sentences.cn: 那些家具将实用和典雅完美结合。

sentences.en: The king carried himself with his customary elegance.
sentences.cn: 国王保持着一贯的温文尔雅。

sentences.en: The name Chanel became a byword for elegance.
sentences.cn: 夏奈尔这个名字成了优雅的代名词。

sentences.en: The ornamental ironwork lends a touch of elegance to the house.
sentences.cn: 铁艺饰件为房子略添雅致.

sentences.en: The pews, the pulpit and the altar are of a piece with the simple elegance of the church itself.
sentences.cn: 长木椅 、 布道坛和祭坛都与教堂朴素高雅的气氛一致.

sentences.en: The room had the elegance of a bygone era.
sentences.cn: 这个房间有着旧时代的优雅.

sentences.en: The statue has a gentleness, an ambience, a wistful elegance.
sentences.cn: 那尊雕像具有一种柔和 、 一种独特格调 、 一种忧郁沉思的雅致.

sentences.en: There was elegance and simple dignity in the way he bore himself.
